Title: Description
Creator Portfolio Management: Creators can manage and showcase their portfolio of past work and collaborations on their profile pages.

Title: Title
Creator Portfolio Management: Description

Title: Showcase Talent
Creator Portfolio Management: As a music collaborator, I want to effectively showcase my musical talent on the platform so that I can attract the attention of record labels and brands.
Unnamed: 2: Allows the user to highlight their skills and creativity, increasing their chances of being discovered by industry professionals.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should provide a user-friendly interface for uploading and sharing music tracks, videos, and other media.The platform should allow users to create a comprehensive profile with information about their musical background, influences, and achievements.The platform should have a rating and review system for users to provide feedback on each other's work.

Title: Discover New Music
Creator Portfolio Management: As a music collaborator, I want to discover new music and talent on the platform so that I can be inspired and potentially collaborate with other artists.
Unnamed: 2: Allows the user to explore and appreciate different genres, styles, and emerging artists, fostering creativity and potential collaborations.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should have a recommendation system that suggests new music and artists based on the user's preferences and listening history.The platform should provide curated playlists, charts, or featured sections to highlight new and popular music.The platform should allow users to follow and connect with artists whose work they admire.

Title: Find Suitable Creators
Creator Portfolio Management: As a content production manager, I want to easily find creators with the right skills and experience for content production projects.
Unnamed: 2: Saves time and effort in searching for suitable creators.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should have a search and filter functionality to narrow down creators based on skills, experience, and location.Creators' profiles should include detailed information about their skills, experience, and past projects.The platform should provide recommendations of creators based on project requirements.

Title: Collaboration Proposal Management
Creator Portfolio Management: As a content production manager, I want to manage and track collaboration proposals from creators.
Unnamed: 2: Facilitates efficient management and evaluation of collaboration proposals.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should provide a centralized location to view and manage collaboration proposals.The platform should allow users to accept, reject, or negotiate proposals.The platform should provide notifications and reminders for pending proposals.

Unnamed: 5: System curates playlists, charts, or featured sections.

Unnamed: 5: User enters search keywords or filter criteria.,System matches creators based on keywords or filter criteria.

Creator Portfolio Management: Creators' profiles include detailed information about their skills, experience, and past projects.
Unnamed: 5: User fills in profile details.,System stores the profile details.

Creator Portfolio Management: The platform provides recommendations of creators based on project requirements.

Title: Title
Creator Portfolio Management: Description

Title: Intuitive Profile Management
Creator Portfolio Management: The system should provide an easy-to-use interface for creators to manage and update their portfolio of past work and collaborations on their profile pages.

Title: Customizable Profile Layout
Creator Portfolio Management: Creators should have the ability to customize the layout and design of their profile pages, allowing them to showcase their unique style and branding.

Title: Efficient Content Upload
Creator Portfolio Management: The system should support fast and seamless uploading of content, such as images, videos, and audio files, to creators' portfolio pages.

Title: Clear Collaboration History
Creator Portfolio Management: Creators' profile pages should clearly display their past collaborations, including details such as the project name, collaborating parties, and the nature of the collaboration.

Title: Easy Collaboration Request Process
Creator Portfolio Management: The system should provide a user-friendly process for other users, such as record labels and brands, to send collaboration requests to creators, including clear instructions and a streamlined interface.

Title: Secure User Authentication
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should implement secure user authentication mechanisms, such as strong password policies, multi-factor authentication, and protection against brute-force attacks.

Title: Data Encryption
Creator Portfolio Management: Sensitive user data, including personal information and collaboration details, should be encrypted both at rest and in transit. This ensures that unauthorized parties cannot access or intercept the data.

Title: Access Controls
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should enforce role-based access controls to ensure that only authorized users can view and modify sensitive information. This includes restricting access to creator portfolios and sponsorship deals based on user roles and permissions.

Title: Secure File Storage
Creator Portfolio Management: Any files uploaded by creators, such as audio files or promotional materials, should be stored securely. This includes implementing measures to prevent unauthorized access, ensuring data integrity, and regularly backing up the files.

Title: Protection against Account Hijacking
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should have measures in place to detect and prevent account hijacking attempts, such as suspicious login activity or unauthorized changes to account details. This includes implementing account recovery mechanisms and notifying users of any suspicious activity.

Title: Fast Profile Loading
Creator Portfolio Management: When a user visits a creator's profile page, it should load within 2 seconds to provide a smooth browsing experience.

Title: Efficient Media Loading
Creator Portfolio Management: Images and videos on creator profile pages should load within 3 seconds to maintain user engagement and interest.

Title: Real-time Collaboration Updates
Creator Portfolio Management: When a creator adds or updates their portfolio of past work and collaborations, the changes should be reflected in real-time on their profile page within 1 second.

Title: Optimized Search for Creators
Creator Portfolio Management: When users search for specific creators or categories, the search results should load within 3 seconds, even during peak usage times.

Title: Smooth Navigation
Creator Portfolio Management: Navigating between different creator profile pages should be seamless, with page transitions taking no longer than 2 seconds.

Title: High Availability for Creator Portfolio Management
Creator Portfolio Management: The system should ensure that the Creator Portfolio Management feature remains operational with a target uptime of 99.99%, allowing creators to showcase their work and collaborations without interruptions.

Title: Data Integrity for Creator Portfolio Management
Creator Portfolio Management: The system should maintain the integrity of creator portfolio data, ensuring that all information and media files associated with past work and collaborations are accurately stored and displayed on creator profile pages.

Title: Scalability for Creator Portfolio Management
Creator Portfolio Management: The system should be able to handle a growing number of creators and their portfolio data without performance degradation, ensuring a smooth user experience even as the platform expands.

Title: Backup and Recovery for Creator Portfolio Management
Creator Portfolio Management: The system should perform regular backups of creator portfolio data and have a recovery process in place to quickly restore any lost or corrupted data, minimizing the impact of potential data loss or system failures.

Title: Secure Access to Creator Portfolio Management
Creator Portfolio Management: The system should implement appropriate security measures to ensure that only authorized creators and platform administrators can access and modify creator portfolio data, protecting the privacy and integrity of the information.

Title: Scalable User Profile Management
Creator Portfolio Management: As the number of creators and their portfolios grow, the system should efficiently manage and display user profiles, ensuring quick retrieval and rendering of portfolio information.

Title: Horizontal Scalability for Collaboration Requests
Creator Portfolio Management: As the platform gains popularity, the system should be able to handle an increasing number of collaboration requests between creators, ensuring that the system remains responsive and efficient.

Title: Efficient Search and Filtering of Creator Profiles
Creator Portfolio Management: As the number of creators on the platform increases, the system should provide fast and accurate search results, allowing record labels and brands to easily find and view creator profiles based on various criteria.

Title: Vertical Scalability for Media Storage
Creator Portfolio Management: As creators upload more content and media files, the system should be able to vertically scale its storage capacity to accommodate the growing volume of media files, ensuring quick and reliable access to stored content.

Title: Scalable Integration with Third-Party APIs
Creator Portfolio Management: As the platform expands its features and integrations with external services, the system should be designed to easily scale and accommodate multiple API integrations without performance degradation.

Title: Integration with Social Media Platforms
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should integrate with popular social media platforms (e.g., Instagram, YouTube) to allow creators to showcase their portfolio by importing content from their social media accounts.

Title: API Integration for Content Aggregation
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should integrate with external APIs (e.g., Spotify, SoundCloud) to allow creators to aggregate and showcase their music or audio content on their portfolio pages.

Title: Secure Authentication and Authorization
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should integrate with secure authentication and authorization mechanisms (e.g., OAuth, JWT) to ensure that only authorized creators can access and manage their portfolio.

Title: Integration with Payment Gateways
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should integrate with payment gateways (e.g., PayPal, Stripe) to enable creators to receive payments for their sponsored content or collaborations.

Title: Integration with Analytics Tools
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should integrate with analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Mixpanel) to provide creators with insights and metrics about their portfolio performance and audience engagement.

Title: Data Privacy and Consent
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform must comply with data privacy regulations and obtain explicit consent from creators for the collection, storage, and use of their personal information.

Title: Intellectual Property Rights
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should have mechanisms in place to protect and enforce intellectual property rights of creators, ensuring that their work is not used without permission or proper attribution.

Title: Transparency in Sponsorship Deals
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should provide transparency in sponsorship deals, ensuring that creators and brands have clear agreements and that sponsored content is clearly disclosed to the audience.

Title: Compliance with Advertising Regulations
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform must comply with advertising regulations, including guidelines on disclosure, endorsements, and sponsored content, to ensure fair and transparent advertising practices.

Title: Secure Payment Processing
Creator Portfolio Management: The platform should ensure secure payment processing for sponsorship deals, protecting the financial information of creators and brands and complying with relevant payment industry standards.
